title: Redaction Protocol
description: To sever the Silken Hand permanently, you must find their blackmail repository in the heavily guarded Black Stacks and destroy it.

turns.narrative: The Black Stacks are guarded by ancient mechanical constructs. The Hand remnants are fighting them to extract the blackmail files before you can destroy them.
turns.choice_a: Let them fight, then finish off the survivors
turns.consequence_a: You save energy, but the Hand secures the files. You have to chase them.
turns.choice_b: Charge in and destroy both sides
turns.consequence_b: A massive three-way chaotic battle. You secure the room but suffer heavy damage.

turns.narrative: You locate the Vault of Secrets. It requires a blood sacrifice to open.
turns.choice_a: Use your own blood (Take moderate damage)
turns.consequence_a: The vault opens smoothly. You find the files.
turns.choice_b: Drag a dead Hand operative and use their blood
turns.consequence_b: The vault opens, but triggers a minor curse trap as punishment for the dead blood.

turns.narrative: You have the blackmail files. You can destroy them, or keep them to manipulate the Council yourself.
turns.consequence_a: The secrets turn to ash. The Council is free from blackmail.
turns.choice_b: Keep them and become the hidden power
turns.consequence_b: You pocket the files. You now hold immense political power over Emberheart.

files_burned.description: The blackmail was destroyed. The Council's integrity is restored.

files_kept.description: You kept the blackmail. You are the shadow ruler now.

conclusion: The blackmail was destroyed. The Council's integrity is restored.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
